query.q: O::`kubelet_pod`:(last(`pod_ip`) AS `Pod IP`) { `cluster_name_k8s` = '#{cluster_name_k8s}' and `namespace` = '#{namespace}' and `node_name` = '#{node_name}' } BY `cluster_name_k8s`, `namespace`, `pod_name`

O::`kubelet_pod`:(last(`node_name`) AS `Node IP`) { `cluster_name_k8s` = '#{cluster_name_k8s}' and `namespace` = '#{namespace}' and `node_name` = '#{node_name}' } BY `cluster_name_k8s`, `namespace`, `pod_name`
